person.persName: George L. Lovier (Christian County, Kentucky apprentice silver smith and soldier)

body.p: Christian County, Kentucky apprentice silver smith and soldier. Kentucky native. Son of Elizabeth Lovier. Apprentice silver smith in Christian County, Kentucky in 1860. Served in the 48th Kentucky Infantry (U.S.A.) as 1st Lieutenant from June 1, 1863 to December 17, 1864.
